features.title: New dashboard type: Blueprint!
features.desc: Blueprint allows linking widgets to multiple devices dynamically, ideal for scaling up applications.

features.title: New widget capabilities
features.desc: For blueprint dashboards, there are brand new widget edit features and capabilities, such as allowing widgets to be transparent!
